title: About us
About_us_text: The Eva Vieira de Almeida Dance School, founded in 2014 in the historic center of Oeiras, transforms dance students into unique and versatile artists. With over 300 awards won in national and international competitions, it remains at the forefront of dance education in Portugal. We promote freedom of expression and respect for individuality, committing ourselves to combating racism and discrimination. Through inclusive policies and equitable practices, we strive to build a fairer and more conscious community.
